scripts.copy: copyfiles -u 1 src/index.html src/*.js src/*.json src/styles/*.css src/js/*.js src/images/* build
scripts.uglify: for f in $(find ./build/ -name "*.js"); do uglifyjs --mangle -o $f $f; done
scripts.watch: npm run pug:w & npm run sass:w & npm run js:w
scripts.build: rm -rf build/* && npm run js && npm run pug && npm run sass && npm run copy && npm run uglify && npm run workbox
